SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Teamcity URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Build Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Location to save" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive file name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!-----------------------------------------------------------Validation check starts----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!Either provide both username and password or both can be empty
:SET &COUNT# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = "0"
:IF &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT#+1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# <> "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT#+1 :ENDIF
:IF &COUNT# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = "1" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "EITHER PROVIDE BOTH USERNAME AND PASSWORD OR BOTH CAN BE EMPTY" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR
:ELSE
! Validating Directory if not empty : IF &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# : SET &ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" cd /d "&ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR#" > nul IF NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 ( SET ERRORS=%ERRORLEVEL% ECHO "ERROR : INVALID ARCHIVE DIR" ) ELSE ( ECHO RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR::=%CD% ) : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" if [ -d "&ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR#" ] ; then ECHO "ERROR : INVALID ARCHIVE DIR" errors=$? else echo RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR::=$pwd fi : ENDIF : ENDIF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:ENDIF
!Archive file name validation (It should not contain any dot) :IF &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = "0" : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#,".") : IF &POS# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = "1" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "PROVIDE ARCHIVE FILE NAME WITHOUT EXTENSION" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : ENDIF :ENDIF
! If Archive DIR is empty assign agents temp DIR : IF &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) ECHO RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR::=&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_DIR# : ENDIF
!Appending trailing slash ('/') if not present :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ADD_TRAILING_SLASH &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR# : SET &FINAL_ARTIFACT_DIR# = &ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR# : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : IF STR_ENDS_WITH(&ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR#,"/") = "N" : SET &FINAL_ARTIFACT_DIR# = STR_CAT (&ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR#,"/") : ELSE : SET &FINAL_ARTIFACT_DIR# = &ESC_ARCHIVE_DIR# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
!-----------------------------------------------------------Validation check ends-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: IF &UC4RB_TMC_RETCODE# = "0" !---------------------------------------------------------Creating Artifact path--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Config Archive file : IF &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# = "buildarchive-&$RUNID#.zip" : ELSE : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# : PSET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME# = STR_CAT("&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#", ".zip") : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH# = STR_CAT(&FINAL_ARTIFACT_DIR#,&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#)
!-------------------------------------Create cURL command to call Teamcity REST api--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth"
: IF &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# EQ "" : IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# EQ "" : SET &AUTH_TYPE# = "guestAuth" : ENDIF : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = "curl -v "
! Teamcity url : SET &UC4RB_TMC_ENDPOINT_URL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_URL#, "/&AUTH_TYPE#/app/rest/builds/id:&UC4RB_TMC_BUILD_ID#/artifacts/archived ") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_ENDPOINT_URL# : SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, """&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"" ")
: SET &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#, "--request GET --header 'accept:application/octet-stream' --output &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH#")
! Username : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_TMC_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TMC_USERNAME# : SET &ESC_USERNAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
! Password : IF &UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD# NE "" ! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_TMC_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Execute curl cmd based on AGENT OS-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" IF %ERRORS%==0 ( echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#"
:IF &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth" &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&ESC_USERNAME#:%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%%{http_code}\n" :ELSE &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%%{http_code}\n" :ENDIF ) IF NOT %ERRORLEVEL%==0 ( ECHO "ERROR: ERROR COMMUNICATING WITH TEAMCITY. CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS." SET ERRORS=%ERRORLEVEL% )
:ELSE
:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" if [ $errors -eq 0 ] then echo "INFO: CURL CMD: &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD#" :IF &AUTH_TYPE# = "httpAuth" &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -u "&ESC_USERNAME#:$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%{http_code}\n" :ELSE &UC4RB_TMC_CURL_CMD# -w "\nUC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE::=%{http_code}\n" :ENDIF
if [ "$?" -gt "0" ] then echo "ERROR: ERROR COMMUNICATING WITH TEAMCITY. CHECK INPUT PARAMETERS." errors=$? fi
fi :ENDIF :ENDIF
:ENDIF ! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RETRIEVE ARTIFACT CMD EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RETRIEVED ARTIFACT CMD FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JETBRAINS_TEAMCITY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
!Publish the artifact location :PSET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# = 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# <> "" : IF &VALUE# <> "" : IF &KEY# = "RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR" : SET &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR# = "&VALUE#" : ELSE : IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE" : SET &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# = &VALUE# : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TMC_RESP_HTTP_CODE# NE "200" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="ERROR COMMUNICATING TEAMCITY." : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : SET &STATUS#=1 :ENDIF
! Prepare Artifact path : SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR#) :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
:IF &END_CHAR# <> "/" OR "\" : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR#, "\") : ELSE : SET &RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR#, "/") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH# = STR_CAT(&RESOLVED_ARCHIVE_DIR#,&UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_NAME#) ! Publishing Artifact path in case of success :IF &STATUS# = 0 : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TMC_ARTIFACT_PATH#,,"TOP" :ENDIF
